questions.title: Row Spiral (Forward) ‚Äî Right first, fill 1..N¬≤
questions.prompt:
Create an N√óN matrix filled in a clockwise spiral starting at the TOP-LEFT cell.

Row Spiral (Right-first) means your first move is RIGHT across the top row.

Directions repeat: Right ‚Üí Down ‚Üí Left ‚Üí Up.

Fill numbers from 1 to N¬≤.

Return the matrix (list of lists) for the given N.

For this question, test with N = 4.
